channel.title: CVE Feed for bdthemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bdthemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5640|2024-06-07T14:36:46.323Z -- bdthemes -- prime%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%28revolution%20of%20a%20slider%2C%20hero%20slider%2C%20ecommerce%20slider%29
item.description: The Prime Slider – Addons For Elementor (Revolution of a slider, Hero Slider, Ecommerce Slider) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘id’ attribute within the Pacific widget in all versions up to, and including, 3.14.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5640|2024-06-07T04:33:24.651Z -- bdthemes -- prime%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%28revolution%20of%20a%20slider%2C%20hero%20slider%2C%20ecommerce%20slider%29
item.description: The Prime Slider – Addons For Elementor (Revolution of a slider, Hero Slider, Ecommerce Slider) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘id’ attribute within the Pacific widget in all versions up to, and including, 3.14.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4606|2024-06-06T19:50:31.816Z -- bdthemes -- ultimate%20store%20kit%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in BdThemes Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons.This issue affects Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-33568|2024-06-05T13:53:43.847Z -- bdthemes -- element%20pack%20pro
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal'), Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in BdThemes Element Pack Pro allows Path Traversal, Object Injection.This issue affects Element Pack Pro: from n/a through 7.7.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-2966|2024-04-11T07:31:36.278Z -- bdthemes -- element%20pack%20elementor%20addons%20%28header%20footer%2C%20template%20library%2C%20dynamic%20grid%20%26%20carousel%2C%20remote%20arrows%29
item.description: The Element Pack Elementor Addons (Header Footer, Template Library, Dynamic Grid & Carousel, Remote Arrows) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 5.5.6 via the element_pack_ajax_search function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including password protected post details.

item.title: CVE-2024-33568|2024-06-04T13:12:10.673Z -- bdthemes -- element%20pack%20pro
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal'), Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in BdThemes Element Pack Pro allows Path Traversal, Object Injection.This issue affects Element Pack Pro: from n/a through 7.7.4.
